Text: That's great, but while original crack doesn't get deleted by anti-virus, this one does. I know it's a false positive, but I'd rather use old crack than play with exceptions, unable to move or copy the file without anti-virus intercepting it.
Finally got it working on Win8 64bit, this is the real deal guys, this crack works with all the Skidrow updates, means you can play DLCs
Oh and many thanks to Gh0stNet and DMN32!
Thanks alot!  Works with all Skidrow DLC's installed over the 1.3.2 patch!
Do you need to have Steam installed for this to work ?

This absolutely works. It's the only way I'm able to play on Win 8.

DMN32 is the fucking king for making this.

Thanks Gh0stNet.

Crack works great, fixes LAN breaking issues from the Skidrow patch. 

Me and some friends all have identical crack files, but upon starting a game it says we have different patch versions, anybody have similar issues?

Thanks DMN32 and Gh0stNet!
I was struggling with SKIDROW on Win 8x64 ... but your great patch fixed the problems.  Mucho Thanks.
